DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate possible protective effect anesthetic technique balance ( sevoflurane ) compare total intravenous anesthetic technique ( propofol , remifentanil ) . The hypothesis Sevoflurane may exert protective effect regard ischemia-reperfusion injury induce microsurgical breast free flap transfer receive area . The investigator evaluate continuous flap tissue oximetry level biochemical marker .
DOC.brief_title: Sevoflurane Protective Effect Ischemia-reperfusion Injury . Multicenter , Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Patient select plastic breast surgery With microsurgical Free flap Over 18 Asa I/II Unusual reaction anesthetic drug Suspect malignant hyperthermia Vasculopathic disease Coagulation disease
